entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wainwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Wainwright 10:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -27.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -31.3°C
Wind: SE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
